Kingsley International School

Key Stage 3 Head & Senior EFL Teacher

Malaysia

Jan 2014 - Present

Managing over 40 teachers and 3 year groups with over 200 students, being the Key Stage 3 Head has allowed me to build up the leadership and managament skills needed to drive my team of teachers to be able to show success through their students. Specialising in middle years EFL for the past 4 years while working in Kingsley International School, English First Language in preperation for Checkpoint has been the one of the focal points of the studies of the student in Year 7.

GwangMun Public Middle School

English Teacher

South Korea

May 2012 - Apr 2013

Gaining exposure in the Korean public school sector was a great experience while working with GwangMun Public Middle School. Having the opportunity to work with the school in 2012 as an English teacher, I was able to expand my skill set in teaching students in the age range of Year 7 to Year 9. Focusing on English as a Second Language teaching, I was able to culturally understand the difficulties experienced first hand students go through learning a language very different from their own mother tongue.
